metadata.dc:author: Regadera Sejas, F J
Pérez García, F J
Rodríguez Martínez, J J
Rabade Rey, C J
Fernández Gómez, J M
San Martín Blanco, A
metadata.dc:description: Crossed fused renal ectopia (CFRE) is a rare anomaly, the incidence of which is estimated in one case per 700-1,000 births. We present here one case of Disk Kidney, an uncommon variant of CFRE, diagnosed in a female adult patient. Fused renal congenital anomalies are reviewed and the etiologies and presentation forms commented.
metadata.dc:title: Riñón en disco. Presentación de un caso.
[Disk kidney. Report of a case].
